eksath rajadhaniyehi rupawahini balapathrakaranaya - wikipidiya eksath rajadhaniyehi rupawahini balapathrakaranaya widyuth pracharana himikam sandaha, widyuth pracharana balapathraya balanna eksath rajadhaniyehi saha kirulata parayaththa rajyayanhi, sajiwi widyuth pracharana rupawahini wikashayan (bhaumika, chandrika, kebala, ho antharjala) narambaima ho pati gatha kirima [1] ho sidu karana oonama niwasak wisin warshika rupawahini bapapathrayak miladi gatha yuthu weyi. 2012 wana wita, meya sandaha waya wana mudala, warna rupawahini sandaha £145.50 kda saha sudu kalu rupawahini sandaha £49.00 kda weyi. [2]

uthuru nagenahira demala ha muslim chandayen ha warga, aagamika ha kula wadaya pilikulkarana buddhimathunge chandayen balayata pathwa dun porondu walata indurama wiruddhawa katayuthu karamin sinhala bauddha chanda gnyanasara himiyan wannawun lawa ‘pik pokat’ gassa wimata darana prayathnaya athishayin pilikul sahagathaya.

muslim amathiwaruntath yam hitha wedanawak thiyenawa.ee sambandhawa api parikshanayak karanawa.apema kabinat amathi kenek ehema kiyanne.bohoma barapathala chodanawak.ee sambandawa apita balanna wenawa.ee aya ee aya wenuwen kathakaranawa.eeka kisima pa්rashnayak naha.apith ee aya wenuwen kathakaranawa.lakshman kirialla amathithumath ee aya gana katha kala.kohoma wunath nuwara siddhiyedi api haniya awama karagaththa.marana 2yi siddha wune.wada balayak yedewwa nam thathwaya mita wada barapathala wenna thibuna.polisiya sudusu aakarayata katayuthu karanne.polisiya kerehi api wishwasaya thahawuru karannath oona.hari de karana polis niladhariya aaraksha karagannath api katayuthu karanna oona.
ballo nam ee athin baladdi hondayi.

japana agramathya yoshihide sugata paksha nayakathwa abhiyogayakata muhunadimata siduwa athayi japan madhya wartha sadahan kara siti.japan agamathiwarayata mema abhiyogaya ella wi athth erata palath mathiwaranawalin palaka libaral prajathanthrawadi pakshaya labu parajaya hamuwe pakshaya thulinma agramathya sugata erehiwa abhiyoga ellawima hethuweni.ee anuwa japanaye hitapu widesha amathyawarayeku wana fumiyo keshida libaral prajathanthrawadi paksha nayakathwaya sandaha tharaga kirimata sudanam wana bawa erata madhya wartha kale ya.yamhayakin japan agramathya yoshihide suga in parajayata pathwuwahoth japanaye keti kalinawa agramathyadhuraya daruwange layisthuwata ohu da ekwanu athayi wides madhya warthawala sandahan ya.
